get.description: 取得系統配置訊息，主要注意这里不在验证权限
get.summary: 取得系統前台配置訊息，主要注意这里不在验证权限
通过流水號取得字典資料
字典類型全部資料 代碼生成使用API
字典類型通过字典id取得

post.description:
取得token
LoginHandler can be used by clients to get a jwt token.
Payload needs to be json in the form of {"username": "USERNAME", "password": "PASSWORD"}.
Reply will be of the form {"token": "TOKEN"}.
dev mode：It should be noted that all fields cannot be empty, and a value of 0 can be passed in addition to the account password
注意：开发模式：需要注意全部字段不能为空，帳號密碼外可以传入0值
